main.bio: Hi! this is Mustafa Haider, Senior Front-end web developer. I have being doing Frond-end developing for the last three years. I used to work for one of the biggest Software Company(SoftTech) as a Senior web developer. Now I help bussiness directly. Languages I'm expert in HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, REACT JS, React-Redux, NextJS.My sevices and me are excited to reach your goals.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to learn something new this year!

testimonials.text: Mustafa is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Mustafa has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
